title: ✍️ Ban gambling ads now
excerpt: Gambling ads are flooding our screens – during sport, on TV, and even in "family" programming. The result? Teenagers in Australia are now more likely to have gambled in the past year than played soccer, basketball, or cricket. Let's take gambling ads off our screens for
description: Gambling ads are flooding our screens – during sport, on TV, and even in "family" programming. The result? Teenagers in Australia are now more likely to have gambled in the past year than played soccer, basketball, or cricket. Let's take gambling ads off our screens for good.
